channel.title: Cold on Tender Meat Love
channel.description: Recent content in Cold on Tender Meat Love

item.title: Bean Salad
item.description: Cook and cool rice Drain and rinse black beans Slice celery into small pieces Mince garlic Thaw/cook corn partially Dice bell pepper and jalapeno Mix everything together in bowl Add 1⁄2 bottle of Italian dressing and season with salt and pepper to taste
